name: leanprover-community.github.io
description: The deployed website lives on the `master` branch of this repository. To make changes to the website, please fork the repository and make a PR against the [`lean4`](https://github.com/leanprover-community/leanprover-community.github.io/tree/lean4) branch. Once your PR is merged, CI will automatically deploy the changes to the `master` branch.
